        public void initParameters(int numFeatures,

        Parameters:

        dimensions - number of latent factors

      • initLearnRates

        public void initLearnRates(int numFeatures)

      • count

        public void count(int numFeatures,
                  DatasetInterface dataset)
        Number of item occurrences in the train set. Used to build up the sample table and bin the results. Note that the result array is not dense. Context and item indices will be filled in with zeros.
        Parameters:
        numFeatures - number of features
        dataset - the train set

      • initSamplingTable

        public void initSamplingTable(int[] itemCount,
                              double alpha,
                              int tableSize)
        Creates a sampling table for a given distribution. Example for size = 3 and distribution = 1 to 10, 2 to 20 will result in int[] = {1, 2, 2} Hence, a uniform sampling over this samplingTable will result in a distribution similar to the given one.
        Parameters:
        itemCount - an array which holds the item occurrences
        alpha - smoothing parameter
        tableSize - sampling table size

      • sample

        public int sample()
        Samples a negative item according to samplingTable distribution
        Returns:
        id of sampled item

      • gaussVector

        public org.jblas.FloatMatrix gaussVector(int dimensions)
        Returns a vector initialized with a gaussian distribution mean = 1, std = 1
        Parameters:
        dimensions - number of dimensions
        Returns:
        Normalized vector
